content.raw:
Two things:

1. It seems a bit inefficient to delete all the lines and then re-add them in `update_plots()`. The other code in that method tries to only modify plots that need changing. I think it would be worth trying to make it more efficient.
2. I again have concerns with colours. This interface looks great if you only have one shot. If you have more than one shot visible, you aren't going to be able to tell what is going on. It will be even more confusing if the trace for shots 2 and 3 are red and green, and thus colour match half of the shutter lines respectively. I think we need to solve the UI design for this, and for the marker colours in pull request #9 before they can be merged. Perhaps the easiest solution is just to make the markers and shutter lines colour match the trace **if** there is more than one trace selected.
